Game Events

Rules and Game Information

(shamelessly plagiarised from KittyMo, somewhat modified)


Pay particular attention to the bolded rules as those are not entirely standard.

1) Follow the Site Rules.
2) During the day you can vote for a player that you think should be lynched. Votes should be in the form Vote: Player or VOTE: Player, but I'll count votes if the intention is clear and there's bolding/some attempt at bolding. Unvotes before registering a new vote are helpful but not required. Note that any attempts at fake votes will be frowned on, and most likely counted anyway.
3) When a player reaches a majority of votes, they are lynched. I will reveal their alignment, and the game will move into night. Players can still talk during twilight.
4) Days will have automatic deadlines of approximately 12 days (announced at the start of the day). This will only be extended in special circumstances, as determined by me. No majority at deadline means no lynch. Additionally, if a majority of all living players vote to no lynch, no lynch will occur and the game will move into twilight.
5) Twilight occurs after a lynch has occured but before the flip. Players may post in the thread during twilight. Twilight may extend for a small period of time after the final votecount to allow for verification of said votecount.
6) Nights will have automatic deadlines of approximately 48 hours. Even if the day post has not been made, any actions submitted after the deadline (announced at the start of the night) will not be counted.
7) No talking to other players, dead or alive, outside of the thread, unless your role permits it.
8) Once dead, you stop posting. Please do not make a "bah" post.
9) Anyone not posting for 48 hours is proddable. Players who fail to post promptly after being prodded or repeatedly require prods may be replaced. I also reserve the right to prod or replace players who are within activity limits but who are trying to find loopholes.
10) I'll try to post votecounts as often as possible. Feel free to ask for a votecount at any time. I'll try not to make mistakes, but let me know if I do. Remember that my timezone will make me unavailable at some points during the day.

11) Avoid excessive profanity, flaming, etc. I may choose to deal with problems of this kind privately, so do not be concerned if no public action is taken.
12) You may paraphrase, but not quote, PMs from the Mod or other forms of private communication. This includes game-related private topics with other players.

13) Do not use encrypted or hard-to-see text (including "invisible" text, text below the 50% text size option, or text hidden via BBCode.) Spoiler tags are fine, but please use the spoiler= tag.
14) Methods of verifiable randomness, including dice tags, should never be used.
15) I will use bolded viridian (#40826D) when editing players' posts and for other official moderation stuff. Don't try to impersonate me.
16) This game has been reviewed for normalcy and balance. Normal Natural Action Resolution will apply.
17) Please PM me if you have questions.
18) I reserve the right to change or add rules if necessary. My priority is to ensure that everybody in this game has the opportunity to enjoy playing the game.

19) If you need to be replaced for any reason, contact me privately and stop posting in the thread. If you wish to request moderator action against another player, contact me privately and do not post about it in the thread.

20) Have fun and play to win!

Consult the Setup Information post below for more details.

Setup Information


  • This setup contains 10 town players and 3 mafia players.
  • At least one player is a Vanilla Townie.
  • There may be zero or more of any other listed role.
  • Communication in private topics occurs only during the night phase.
  • The Mafia team has a single kill each night, which may be delivered by any one living Mafia player. A player who delivers the nightkill cannot use any other powers they may have.
  • If Player A roleblocks Player B and Player B roleblocks Player C, then B is roleblocked and C is not. If Player A and Player B roleblock each other, they are both roleblocked. In this and any other interactions this game follows Normal Natural Action Resolution.
  • Neighbours occur only in pairs.
  • This game has been balance reviewed.

The possible roles are:
  • Vanilla Townie
  • Town Neighbour
  • Town Roleblocker
  • Town Doctor
  • Town 2-Shot Vigilante
  • Town Macho Tracker
  • Town Universal Backup
  • Mafia Goon
  • Mafia Neighbour
  • Mafia Roleblocker
  • Mafia Tracker
  • Mafia Watcher

You are encouraged to consult the following role PMs for details.

Spoiler: Town Role PMs
Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities
  • None.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town Neighbour.

Abilities
  • You may communicate with your Neighbour partner {Player} at night in the following private topic: {LINK}
  • The alignment of your Neighbour partner is NOT guaranteed.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town Roleblocker.

Abilities
  • Each night phase, you may attempt to block another player from performing their own action (if any).
  • You will receive no notification as to the success or failure of your action.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town Doctor.

Abilities
  • Each night phase, you may attempt to protect one player in the game from being nightkilled. You may not protect yourself.
  • You will receive no notification as to the success or failure of your action.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town 2-Shot Vigilante.

Abilities
  • Twice during the game, you may attempt to kill another player during the night phase.
  • Your shot will not be refunded if your action is blocked or if your target is protected. You will receive no notification in any case.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town Macho Tracker.

Abilities
  • Each night, you may investigate one player in the game and you will discover which player they targeted (if any).
  • If the target of your investigation targeted somebody you will receive the message "{Player} targeted {Player}". If the target of your investigation does not target anybody you will receive the message "{Player} did not target anybody". If your action is blocked you will receive the message "No result".
  • You may not by any means be protected from being killed.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Town Universal Backup.

Abilities
  • You begin the game with no powers.
  • If a town-aligned power role dies, you will inherit their abilities, including any modifiers or restrictions. This will only occur the first time that a town-aligned power role dies. This event cannot be blocked.
  • If multiple town-aligned power roles die at the same time, you will inherit the abilities of whichever of those roles appears earliest in this list: {Macho Tracker, Doctor, 2-Shot Vigilante, Roleblocker, Neighbour, Universal Backup}.
  • If you inherit a power you will receive the message "You have inherited the abilities of a {Role}", followed by a copy of the abilities section of the relevant role's Role PM.
  • See the list of interactions with other roles in the OP for details.
Win condition
  • You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town player is alive.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Spoiler: Mafia Role PMs
Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Mafia Goon.
Your teammates are {Player} the {Role} and {Player} the {Role}. You may communicate with your Mafia team at night in the following private topic: {LINK}

Abilities
  • You may deliver the Mafia faction's nightkill.
Win condition
  • You win when all non-Mafia players are eliminated or nothing can prevent the Mafia team from accomplishing this.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Mafia Neighbour.
Your teammates are {Player} the {Role} and {Player} the {Role}. You may communicate with your Mafia team at night in the following private topic: {LINK}

Abilities
  • You may deliver the Mafia faction's nightkill.
  • You may communicate with your Neighbour partner {Player} at night in the following private topic: {LINK}
  • The alignment of your Neighbour partner is NOT guaranteed.
Win condition
  • You win when all non-Mafia players are eliminated or nothing can prevent the Mafia team from accomplishing this.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Mafia Roleblocker.
Your teammates are {Player} the {Role} and {Player} the {Role}. You may communicate with your Mafia team at night in the following private topic: {LINK}

Abilities
  • You may deliver the Mafia faction's nightkill.
  • Each night phase, instead of delivering the nightkill, you may attempt to block another player from performing their own action (if any).
  • You will receive no notification as to the success or failure of your action.
Win condition
  • You win when all non-Mafia players are eliminated or nothing can prevent the Mafia team from accomplishing this.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Mafia Tracker.
Your teammates are {Player} the {Role} and {Player} the {Role}. You may communicate with your Mafia team at night in the following private topic: {LINK}

Abilities
  • You may deliver the Mafia faction's nightkill.
  • Each night phase, instead of delivering the nightkill, you may investigate one player in the game and you will discover which player they targeted (if any).
  • If the target of your investigation targeted somebody you will receive the message "{Player} targeted {Player}". If the target of your investigation does not target anybody you will receive the message "{Player} did not target anybody". If your action is blocked you will receive the message "No result".
Win condition
  • You win when all non-Mafia players are eliminated or nothing can prevent the Mafia team from accomplishing this.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Welcome, {Player Name}, you are a Mafia Watcher.
Your teammates are {Player} the {Role} and {Player} the {Role}. You may communicate with your Mafia team at night in the following private topic: {LINK}

Abilities
  • You may deliver the Mafia faction's nightkill.
  • Each night phase, instead of delivering the nightkill, you may investigate one player in the game and you will discover which players they were targeted by (if any).
  • If the target of your investigation was targeted by at least one player you will receive the message "{Player} was targeted by {Players}". If the target of your investigation was not targeted by anybody you will receive the message "{Player} was not targeted by anybody". If your action is blocked you will receive the message "No result".
Win condition
  • You win when all non-Mafia players are eliminated or nothing can prevent the Mafia team from accomplishing this.

To confirm, please reply to this PM and state your role.


Spoiler: Specific Universal Backup interactions
  • If you inherit the power of a Town Neighbour, you will be given a link to the existing Neighbourhood private topic. The message "{Player Name} is now a Neighbour" will be posted in that topic.
  • If you inherit the power of a Town 2-Shot Vigilante, you also inherit the number of shots the Vigilante had at the time of their death.
  • If you inherit the power of a Town Macho Tracker, you inherit the Macho modifier as well as the Tracker power. You will not learn the result of any investigations the Tracker made before their death.
  • If you inherit the power of a Town Doctor or Roleblocker it works just like you would expect.

Role PMs will be sent out shortly.

Role PMs have been sent. The game will begin once 11/13 players have confirmed or in 48 hours from now ((expired on 2016-03-06 17:29:00)).

So far 12/13 players have confirmed.

The game will begin shortly.

Game comments

I don't have much to say here - I didn't read the thread closely enough to work out what I would have thought with limited information. If you would like feedback on your play, ask and I'll have a go at it.

With respect to night actions, I feel quite sure that failing to kill or block Frozen Angel for the first two nights was a mistake for obvious reasons.

The roleblock on Dierfire coinciding with a no-shot from scum was unfortunate; I am unsure whether I would have lynched Dierfire in that situation had he had the opportunity to claim. It's possible that lynching him was knowably a mistake but it's not something I would flame over.

Moderation comments

The n_n replacements
The thread was locked temporarily at #193 because another player raised a concern with me that n_n might be an alt of a player already in the game, and I was worried that whether this was accurate or not the direction of thread discussion at that time might derail or entirely compromise the game. I checked with the listmod, who told me that n_n was not an alt of a player in this game. In the meantime, n_n requested replacement on the grounds that he felt his presence was inadvertently derailing the game and making it unplayable for himself and others. I consider this entire affair an unfortunate set of circumstances and hold nobody at fault.

Frozen Angel requesting replacement, etc.
Frozen Angel's posts around pages 10-20 were indeed against rule 19 and in general I don't think they were entirely appropriate to a Mafia game. Considering that I had not emphasised my atypical rule re. requesting replacement, and that no previous warnings had been given, I did not feel that action beyond the private warning I gave was appropriate at that time, and as far as I saw everyone's behaviour was fine after that point. If there is something I missed (entirely possible, I didn't read the thread in great detail) please do bring it to my attention. This decision was made without regard to Frozen Angel's alignment or role.

The late d5 daypost
I screwed up. Sorry :p

Feedback

Any feedback to me about the moderation of this game and the setup is welcome. In particular, if anybody felt that votecounts/flips/etc were unreasonably tardy, an issue was handled improperly, or that the setup was flawed in some way, let me know.
